comment.author: 16830149@N02
comment._content:
Name:Richard Bunker
Birth Place:London
Residence:Blackfriars
Death Date:22 Oct 1916
Death Location:France & Flanders
Enlistment Location:Southwark, Surrey
Rank:Private
Regiment:Border Regiment
Battalion:1st Battalion
Number:22808
Type of Casualty:Died of wounds
Theatre of War:Western European Theatre

comment.author: 72133717@N05
comment._content: According to the 1911 Census he was living at 36 King James Street, London. He was working as a railway porter. He had been married to Mary Bunker for 6 years and they had 3 children, Sarah age 6, William age 3 and Richard age 8 months.
